short_summary: This procurement is for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services. The requirement is for one (1) Technical Clerk - Intermediate Support Service.
description: This requirement is only open to the below list of pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS). The requirement is for the services of: \\n- Technical Clerk coordination and support services to Director General Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)\\/Director Aerospace Equipment Program Management (Fighters and Trainers) 6-3 (DAEPM(FT) 6-3). \\n
